original_text: Whenever Jehudi had read three or four columns of the scroll, the king cut them off with a scribe’s knife and threw them into the firepot, until the entire scroll was burned in the fire.
korean_text: 여후디가 서너 쪽을 낭독하면 왕이 면도칼로 그것을 연하여 베어 화로 불에 던져서 두루마리를 모두 태웠더라

sentences.original_text: Whenever Jehudi had read three or four columns of the scroll,
sentences.korean_translation: 여후디가 두루마리의 세 네 칸을 읽을 때마다,

sentences.original_text: the king cut them off with a scribe's knife
and threw them into the firepot,
until the entire scroll was burned in the fire.
